body.raw:
<Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <Body>
        <Book_Insert xmlns="http://www.inflectra.com/LibraryInformationSystem/Services/">
            <!--Represents a book-->
            <!-- Optional -->
            <book>
                <!--The author of the book
Represents an author-->
                <!-- Optional -->
                <Author xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">
                    <!--The age of the author-->
                    <Age>[int?]</Age>
                    <!--The id of the author-->
                    <Id>[int?]</Id>
                    <!--The name of the author-->
                    <Name>[string?]</Name>
                </Author>
                <!--The id of the book's author-->
                <AuthorId xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[int?]</AuthorId>
                <!--The date/time the book was added-->
                <DateAdded xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[dateTime?]</DateAdded>
                <!--The date/time the book was added in ISO format-->
                <DateAddedIso xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[string?]</DateAddedIso>
                <!--The genre of the book
Represents a genre-->
                <!-- Optional -->
                <Genre xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">
                    <!--The id of the genre-->
                    <Id>[int?]</Id>
                    <!--The name of the genre-->
                    <Name>[string?]</Name>
                </Genre>
                <!--The id of the book's genre-->
                <GenreId xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[int?]</GenreId>
                <!--The id of the book-->
                <Id xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[int?]</Id>
                <!--Is the book out of print-->
                <IsOutOfPrint xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[boolean?]</IsOutOfPrint>
                <!--The name of the book-->
                <Name xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Inflectra.SampleApplications.LibraryInformationSystem.Web.DataObjects">[string?]</Name>
            </book>
        </Book_Insert>
    </Body>
</Envelope>
